segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a total mess—disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks filthy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's foot in it—gross, she'll track it everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids grabbing cookies with who knows what on their hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's tilting, probably covered in grime from the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets letting dust and crumbs fly around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel she's using might be damp from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes just waiting to get wet and ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the window view can't hide this sloppy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how careless it all seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinet doors—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my skin crawl.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone clean this up before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
